root.name: PRadioButton
root.description: A radio button component. Used with the PRadioButtonGroup object to present a mutually-exclusive set of selectable options. Does not include a label, use a PLabel object to display a textual label next to it. The size of the component defines the size of the radio button.

field.fdescription: This can be any id you wish to set to keep track of your radio buttons
True if this radio button is selected

method.mdescription: Handles pressing and selecting/de-selecting this radio button when the FIRE button is pressed.
Releases the pressed state of this button when the FIRE button is released.

cparameter.cdescription: the group this button is a member of
